scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Six manuscript pages concerning the sale of indigo, unrefined sugar, and 324 guinea slaves to M. de Fleurian by Captain Audebert of the Navire l'Elizabet de la Rochelle in St. Dominique in 1750. The pages are written in French, and cover the period 7 April to 5 June 1750.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The documents are arranged in chronological order.

scopecontent.p: Debit ledger accounts (5 June 1750), original and a copy, the original signed by de Fleurian and Audebert.
Credit ledger accounts (5 June 1750), original and a copy, the original signed by de Fleurian and Audebert.
"Liasse de Compter" (June 1750), an unsigned slip of paper
